Quick reminder 

- Market thinks you don’t have fiscal space and your policymaking sucks (e.g. UK, EMs): fiscal stimulus = bad for your currency 

- Market thinks you are fiscally prudent and run by decent policymakers (e.g. Germany): fiscal stimulus = good for your currency
